title: Clinical Trial Finder | Pancreatic Cancer Action Network
description: The Pancreatic Cancer Action Network's Clinical Trial Finder connects pancreatic cancer patients and researchers with clinical research trials.
cleaned_text: An authorized healthcare provider account is required to access features including the ability to save, share, and download trial details. Already have an account? Sign In Request an Account View "Match to Patient" Filters Trials Within of ZIP Code To select and apply Advanced Treatment History options to your trial search, Stage III or IV must be selected under 'Stage of Pancreatic Cancer' and an 'Overall Treatment History' must be selected. We are committed to providing the most accurate and complete trial information. However, we cannot guarantee it. If you would like to report an incorrect piece of information, please contact our administrator.
